
public class TaskMock {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter your String");
		String s=sc.nextLine();
		
		String[] str=s.split(" ");
		String first=str[0];
		//System.out.println(first);
		
		switch(first) {
		case "add":System.out.println(Integer.parseInt(str[1])+Integer.parseInt(str[2]));
		break;
		case "sub":System.out.println(Integer.parseInt(str[1])-Integer.parseInt(str[2]));
		break;
		case "multiply":System.out.println(Integer.parseInt(str[1])*Integer.parseInt(str[2]));
		break;
		case "division":System.out.println(Integer.parseInt(str[1])/Integer.parseInt(str[2]));
		break;
		}

	}

	}
